channel.title: Genesys Experience as a Service
channel.description: Recent content on Genesys Experience as a Service

item.title: Getting Started with Genesys Multicloud CX™
item.description: Learn how to deploy and configure Genesys Multicloud CX™ with a step-by-step guide and automated provisioning

item.title: Automation with CX as Code
item.description: Learn how deploy a Genesys Cloud Architect flow and its dependent objects using Archy and CX as Code to manage Architect flows and dependent objects as plain text files that can be checked into source control.

item.description: Learn how to setup & configure Genesys Cloud CX™️
